DOC.brief_summary: The aim retrospective study review describe safety efficacy Tang Ning Tong Luo capsule .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Tang Ning Tongluo Formula Type 2 Diabetics Clinical Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: The aim retrospective study review describe safety efficacy Tang Ning Tong Luo capsule , traditional Chinese Miao medicine , Type 2 Diabetics .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1. diagnosis type 2 diabetes one year . 2. sustain followup time > 3 month . 3 . TNTL single combine treatment time > 3 month . 4 . Chinese ethnicity . Exclusion criterion : 1. medical record information original available . 2. lactate pregnant . 3. diagnosis heart failure , acute myocardial infarction , stroke , serious injury . 4. condition suitable trial evaluate physician charge .
